jobTitle: Senior Data Scientist, Fraud and Anti-Abuse
jobDescription: Do you believe that creators should have the ability to get paid for the value they give to their fans? We do, which is why we're building Patreon, a platform that powers membership services for creators with established followings. Patreon strives to provide creators with insight, education, and tools that make it possible to retain creative control while running their creative business, so creators can focus on creating and energizing their fanbases.  Patreon's creator base has doubled in the last year alone, and we have paid over $350 million directly to creators on our platform. In order to support this level of growth, Patreon is looking for a Senior Data Scientist focused on Fraud and Anti-Abuse to join our Data Science Team.The Data Science Team makes it easy to make Patreon better. We work fast and emphasize impact. We inform product, team, and company strategy with research and analytics. Our team culture is highly autonomous. You choose the focus areas within our roadmap that excite you most, surface user and business insights, and collaborate with the rest of the company to ensure that everyone makes great decisions, informed by data.What you will do:
